title: Team Exile 5 AMA ~ Ask us ANYTHING!
body:
Hi Everyone,

We're Team Exile 5 currently competing in the OPL and we will be answering questions from 6pm AEDT – 7pm AEDT!
I can confirm we are CURRENTLY IN A SCRIM, and will try answer questions earlier depending on when we finish.

Most of you probably know of our situation but if you've been living under an OCE Esports rock: [Click Here!
](http://oce.lolesports.com/articles/exile5-change-ownership-75275)

Click on the names for Twitter pages and Youtube/Twitch for links!

Our roster comprises of:
Top Laner - [FivetoEight](https://twitter.com/5287052) : [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/dani027ification)
Jungler - [Guts](https://twitter.com/GutsOCE) : [Twitch](https://twitch.tv/gutsoce)
Midlaner - [Midbeast](https://twitter.com/Midbeast) : [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6mWuX4R9Yn5y0fWCwzqiSg) / [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/abs_midbeast)
ADC - [Crayzee](https://twitter.com/OceCrayzee)
Support - [Tgun (TILTILTILTILT)](https://twitter.com/tgunAU) : [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/tguntv) / [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tgunau/)

Additionally, Me ([Sebbie](https://twitter.com/SebbieSawrr), Manager) and [Jordy](https://twitter.com/JordyOCE) (Coach) will be lurking around if any of you want to ask us anything.

replies.body:
Directed @X5 Crayzee 

Who would win in a fight, Josh "Jappa" Jones or Joel "LeanDoer" Roberts?
I'm taking LeanDoer as a strong favorite due to his overwhelming size advantage, and specialized Jappa Pumpers(TM). Jappa might be in with a shot though if he plays it smart.

@x5 Crayzee hi Dobie, it's me Chimpy Chimperson, big fan here really excited to get in touch. Just had one question, which is the better trilogy in your eyes Twilight or Lord of the Rings? I'm personally leaning toward twilight just due to the fact that there's way better "best girls(tm)" (see: Traps) and Lord of the Rings has a cringy little CGI orclet(TM) based off of Penders physical characteristics, who is also voiced by Jappa Jones and has kleptomania for hand jewelry. Anyways sorry about the rant thanks for reading Tgun, big fan of you and the rest of the Avant Garde squad. Will be tuning into every HoN game of the next OPL split and rooting for youg guys! P I C K   V A L K Y R I E
Definitely Twilight, I love things that sparkle.
Yes

@x5 Crayzee 
mine is a two part question 
One, are you Cumming for crayzee 
two, what does ADC mean ?
If you had the money, would you invest in a seasoned retired player from overseas to help the team be more successful?

yes

https://puu.sh/uClcM/c28c018aa6.png

Absolutely would invest, specifically in support staff - not a knock to our wonderful coach & manager, but given how small the skill gap is on an individual level at the top, we simply need more work on our teamplay.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
@Crayzee can I borrow your whip mate I needa hit up the dueling arena
I have 3 in the bank from slayer, hit me up!
Hey guys - What do you all do personally to "untilt" yourselves?
https://puu.sh/uCedW/4fc5e6cd51.png
I usually take a break, do something to take my mind off of league for a while and just reset.
This is for all the players, where did your playing name come from, and is their any story behind why it is what it is?
https://puu.sh/uCmgn/0f87204280.png
berserk the anime
WEEB (<3)
Overly confident 15-year-old :)
My original name on Xbox live was Sgt Crayzee, once i joined a team i just dropped the "Sgt".
Question for all, cats or dogs?
https://puu.sh/uCjKG/53aeeab957.png
BOTH!
@Fivetoeight How many stacks do you think a top lane Singed would need to pop off?

Give him him until 8

https://puu.sh/uCjY2/b1659c42ff.png
Hey 528, could you please enamour me with your creative talent in picture format?
https://puu.sh/uCgWX/b709c77acb.png
you are a god amongst men, not only on the rift
CRAYZE THE ADC PRODIGY 1v9ing THIS AMA LIKE A CHAMP. TRULY AN INSPIRATION
Someone has to put in the hard yards around here.
@stinky barrows gloves soon?
Midbeast is the best looking player in the OPL.
Not a question, but still factual.

A lot of respect for you guys to keep on keeping on in the face of so much friction.

Given your situation and near certain relegation matches, do you think there is still a clear gap between top of the OCS and the OPL?

I would have thought being exposed regularly to OPL level games and scrims would give you a clear benefit over OCS teams. Is there a time coming were OCS teams will have very little chance to relegate gaming housed OPL teams that outscrim them 10-1?
Who is your favorite past OPL team??????
Rich Gang.
the oce legends
When is Exiled 5 replacing their bot lane? {{champion:40}}

@x5 Crayzee 
Who was your favourite support to play with?
Well its either Tgun because of the experience he brings to the lane and for how much he has taught me or Riggered because he is a nice guy.
So this is it huh? Nice guy zoned
How much do players get paid, and how much of that is subsidized by Riot?
https://puu.sh/uCltB/b7d4637576.png
@Crayzee If current X5 had to vs OOL Reload from last year, how fast do you think it would take for Masimo to thrash Midbeast in mid and carry the game 1v5?

Midbeast would get outfarmed, outsklilled and outsmarted

https://puu.sh/oRn1r/0b10196cac.jpg
I'm speaking on behalf on Crayzee, and say 3 minutes.
2 and a half on Sundays.

What are the chances of being able to snag a Guts jersey now? Basically nil?

Can I grab a St Patrick's Day froffy with me favourite Big Jords?
